column4: Anyone know how to get my xwinwrap to show underneath my desktop icons instead of over them?
xwinwrap -ni -argb -fs -s -st -sp -b -nf -- /usr/lib/xscreensaver/glmatrix -window-id WID -delay 10000 - but which option exactly was for background i don't remember
well I've tried -o 1
for opaque
didn't work
btw I don't have glmatrix, I've tried installing rss-glx and that xscreensaver pak ect.
any xscreensaver using opengl should work
yah but i would like glmatrix though
matrixview I don't like I don't like cmatrix either
glmatrix is nice though
maybe sending the file to you and placing it to /usr/lib/xscreensaver/ would work for you
if you wouldn't mind
but i'm on 2.1KB :(
you mean dial-up ? its a small file about 350KiB -> http://rapidshare.de/files/26129820/glmatrix.html here it is, hope it works for you
k thx
yes on dialup at 2.1KB
maybe you'll have to make it executable by using chmod +x
kk
after installing latest compiz my decoration themes no longer work, could anyone tell me why ?
I wonder if thats why none of my xscreensavers work when I want to just do regular screen savers? You think I need to chmod +x the dir xscreensavers?
nope, they should work without this
it won't let me move it to /usr/lib/xscreensaver and i've even sudo chmod +x that dir
